title: The Babylon Hoard: Book 3 of The Key Trilogy
description: World War One is over and Jack Riley comes home where The Key awaits him. Searching for the answer to the thousand year mystery of The Key takes him half way around the world. Is the Babylon Hoard real or a fanciful myth handed down from the Crusades? If it ever existed has it survived more than fifteen centuries of treasure hunters and looters? Will he survive long enough to solve the puzzle that cost the lives of the others who came before him?  MacCotter's The Babylon Hoard is a thriller that keeps readers on the edge of their seat from the first page.
author: Sean MacCotter
